name: What does make you cry? I
description:
An invitation to reflection: What does make you cry?
The character is based on a sculpture from a patient of Hans Prinzhorn, pioneering psychiatrist that collected and analyzed the artwork of his patients, mostly diagnosed with schizophrenia. The reference image is featured in Artistry of the Mentally Ill - 1922.
Also a kind of self-portrait with my own tats and moods, like crying in the shower to hide the tears.
See more in the link: https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/hans-prinzhorn-s-artistry-of-the-mentally-ill-1922
